description: This file defines a React functional component called ConfluencePanel that manages connection to Confluence via OAuth or API Token. It handles user authentication, fetching and displaying Confluence spaces, and connection state management.

methods.name: handleOAuthConnect
methods.description: Initiates OAuth connection flow by redirecting to an authorization URL obtained from backend API.

methods.name: handleTokenAuth
methods.description: Handles authentication via API token by sending form data to backend API and managing loading/error states.

methods.name: fetchSpaces
methods.description: Fetches list of Confluence spaces from backend API after successful connection.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Updates form data state as user types into input fields.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Resets connection state and clears stored data to disconnect from Confluence.
